thread.title: Guyana team gained key insights on port modernizing, agri-development in EU tour - Go-Invest
thread.title_full: Guyana team gained key insights on port modernizing, agri-development in EU tour - Go-Invest

author: Stabroek News
title: Guyana team gained key insights on port modernizing, agri-development in EU tour - Go-Invest
text:
A delegation from Guyana which participated in the inaugural EU–Guyana Global Gateway Study and Investment Mission has returned home after a week of “high-level” engagements across France, Belgium, the Netherlands, and Spain.
The mission explored European models in port operations, maritime governance, agro-innovation, and cold-chain logistics areas that have become increasingly important to Guyana’s development trajectory as the country expands its trade and logistics capacity, a statement from the Guyana Office for Investment (Go-Invest) said.
The delegation engaged in intensive sessions on port operations, including detailed examinations of the systems in place at Antwerp-Bruges, Rotterdam, Fos-Marseille, Málaga, and Algeciras, where delegates observed advanced digitalisation platforms such as Port Community Systems (PCS), as well as green transition policies, integrated cruise-cargo management, and cold chain logistics.
